title: Right honest question.
body:
So because i consistently and reliably absolutely dumpster people in my elo 1v1 now its become a recurring thing to die 3 or 4 times to me and then start bringing the entire team as backup.

Like im not kidding ill just be farming something in the middle of nowhere chance upon someone start killing them then next minute the entire team are running from whereever the fuck they were at the time to help the guy, doesnt matter if they are on the other side of the map they will tp onto me if they have to.

So how do i deal with the inability to fight without being 5v1'd if im in bronze elo so my team wont cooperate if i try to get them to.

Like personally my only solace is knowing even if i lose that game they won using cheese tactics that dont work in higher elo games where teams are less likely to make mistakes and in turn you are less likely to be the only person able to fight the enemy team, aka they wont climb.

because if they cant 1v1 me, then how do they plan to fight 5 of me in a higher elo.

i would like to stress a point here, i said cant not wont, like quite literally will run the fuck away if they are alone because the last time they got anywhere close to me alone i ate them alive.

replies.body:
I'm no pro so take this with a grain of salt... it sounds like you're staying in laning phase too long and are not spreading your lead across other lanes. Therefore you allow the other team to group up, take you down, which then leads you to lose what lead you had over time, and potentially making you tilt and lose the game.

I highly recommend checking out these videos. They teach you how to take your lead and spread it to other lanes, leading to a win.
- [Leaguecraft 101 Episode 6 How To Roam](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6bp932bJRXA&list=PL9RdXhXESRJzgY_SwHB8T-cZxXljWhQvz&index=6)
- [Leaguecraft 101 Episode 8 How To Carry](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iQr0dgCYKhw&list=PL9RdXhXESRJzgY_SwHB8T-cZxXljWhQvz&index=8)
- [Leaguecraft 101 Episode 18 Mid Game and Rotations](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7_Rbj_71s08&list=PL9RdXhXESRJzgY_SwHB8T-cZxXljWhQvz&index=18)
tbh none of that is news to me, but i appreciate the attempt
If none of this is news to you, your fate is in your hands. GL!

Be the one preemptively roaming. If your team won't rotate to you, rotate to your team. If you're that far ahead roam bot, double kill their lane, take tower.

I got to Silver from shot-calling back in the day. My ping was so bad that I just played Annie Support and called for my Jungler ONCE for ONE all-in and just got my team to rotate well enough that we could consolidate a lead and close out the game methodically. Double kill bot. Take Dragon. Back. Take mid. Back. Spend and close out game with huge gold lead.
